meanings.definition: To discover or identify the presence or existence of something.
meanings.sent1: I detected a faint smell of cookies in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The security system detected movement outside the house.
meanings.sent3: As a detective, he detected the hidden clue in the mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: Her keen eyes detected the slightest change in his expression.
meanings.sent5: The radar detected the approaching storm with precision.

meanings.sent1: She detected a hint of sadness in his voice.
meanings.sent2: The dog detected the scent of food from afar.
meanings.sent3: The robot detected an error in its programming and stopped moving.
meanings.sent4: The scientist detected a pattern in the data that others had missed.
meanings.sent5: The teacher detected confusion among the students and explained the lesson again.
